credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Konkrete Utopien in Kunst und Gesellschaft
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: White background; in the center, the number "68" in red, with the text "je participe / tu paticipes / il participe / nous participons / vous participez" (the declention of the French verb "to participate"), rotated 90 degrees and overlapping the number "68." At upper right, the inscription: "Konkrete Utopien / in Kunst / und Gesellschaft / um 1968," and at lower right, "Museum / fur Gestaltung / Zurich / 19. Sept. bis. 11 Nov. 90", and the museum hours, lower center: "Di-Fr 20-28 UHr, Mi 10-21 Uhr, Sa. So 10-17 Uhr, and mo Geschlossen".
name: Poster
